name: aaiti
description: A.A.I.T.I v1.0 - Auto AI Trading Interface: Production-Ready Neural Command Deck for AI-Powered Trading

scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && npx serve -s build -l 3000
scripts.build:all: npm run build && echo 'Build complete - ready for production'
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules && rm -rf frontend/build
